title: Three playes written by Sir William Killigrew, vice-chamberlain to Her Majesty the Queen Consort, 1664, viz. [brace] Selindra, Pandora, Ormasdes.
author: Killigrew, William, Sir, 1606-1695.
publisher: Printed by T. Mabb; for John Playfere ...; and Thomas Horsman ...,
notes: Separate t.p. and pagination for each play; Pandora dated 1664.
Between pages 86 and 87 of the second play are bound pages 45 to 48 of a different play.
Inperfect: print show-through and tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
